desc: Founded on the Fish Pier. Boston Lobster Company was founded in 1986 by Neil Zarella. With his vision and guidance, we have grown to become one of the premier distributors of live lobsters around the world. Today we continue to grow and look forward to providing companies with quality hard-shell lobsters year-round.

layout.text: With over 50 years of combined experience, our packers handle your shipment with the greatest of care and expertise for delivery down the street or around the globe.
